name: ai-reception
description: タブレット型AI受付システムのStep1実装。LangGraph + FastAPI + NextJSを使用したテキスト・音声対応来客システム。

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "backend,visitor,staff" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:visitor" "npm run dev:staff"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:
npm run install:all && echo '
✅ Setup complete! Next steps:
1. Copy backend/.env.example to backend/.env
2. Edit backend/.env with your API keys
3. Run: npm run dev
'
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/__pycache__ backend/.pytest_cache
scripts.dev:clean: npm run kill-ports && sleep 2 && npm run dev
scripts.test: echo "Run 'npm run test:backend' or 'npm run test:frontend' for specific tests"
